duties_responsibilities.duty: Designing and developing the VCG CXP engineering application suite for Consumer and Business customers.
Working closely with stakeholders to streamline operations and monitor the health and performance of the application suite.
Developing and implementing process suggestions for maximizing operational efficiency, profitability, and key application throughput measures.
Creating dashboards, utility screens, order correction tools, health check automation tools, etc., to support field operations functions.
Developing key monitoring dashboards for Operations Management and ensuring ease of use.
Implementing best practices and procedures to enhance business growth and productivity.
Collaborating with functional units of an organization to develop and integrate new or existing services.
Managing Application engineering services to ensure they meet client/customer expectations and requirements.
Building and maintaining positive trust relationships with key stakeholders across IT and Frontline teams.
Ensuring IT Field operations comply with all local and federal labor laws and legislations.
Working on work shifts to ensure efficient operations.
Performing code analysis, static code tools usage, and additional tools to produce good quality code.
Implementing nonfunctional requirements such as performance, scalability, reliability, and extensibility.
Providing recommendations on servers, load balancing, high availability, disaster recovery, and storage architectures.
Analyzing architecture, relationships between systems, and system flows.
Assessing system usage trends and identifying potential performance and intersystem flaws.
Evaluating solutions alignment and end user experience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
